name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch Your Mouth ‚Äì Keep LinkedIn Professional

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tag rude or abusive LinkedIn users. AI checks complaints, making the badge visible to others. Keep your interactions professional.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of dealing with rude, obnoxious, or abusive comments on LinkedIn? The Watch Your Mouth Chrome extension is here to help! With just one click, you can tag individuals who cross the line in their comments, adding a "Watch Your Mouth" badge to their profile.

How it works:

ü§¨ A "Watch Your Mouth" button appears next to the commenter's profile.
‚úÖ If you find their comment inappropriate, mark their profile.
ü§ñ Our AI system will validate if the comment truly crosses the line based on the context.
‚≠ê If confirmed, the badge will become visible to other Watch Your Mouth users, helping everyone identify unprofessional behaviour.

Stay informed. Stay professional. Download Watch Your Mouth today and ensure smoother, more positive interactions on LinkedIn!
